content: **45 x 60 throw in lion brand #860 vanna s choice on s-35 19mm hook** lion brand pattern # 70347ad skill level easy level 2 gauge 3 v-sts + 4 row = 6 in 15 cm in pattern with 3 strands of yarn held together vanna s choice® article #860 3 colors 5 balls each 15 balls total *linen white beige* crochet hook - size s-35 speed hook 19 mm 11 in 28 cm piece of cardboard for fringe optional pattern v_stitch 1-row repeat throw is worked with 1 strand each of 3 different colors held together throughout work side edging and add fringe to finish *ravelry 5-1/2 hour throw patterns in lion brand yarn * vanna s choice s-35 19 mm hook vanna s choice tv lapghan 2 q-19 15 75 mm hook jiffy 3 wool-ease thick & quick 4 homespun or holiday homespun 5 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw---tv-lapghan 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw-3 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour-throw-4 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/5-1-2-hour---holiday-throw-smaller
